definitions.text: a substance that is fluid at room temperature and pressure
continuous amorphous matter that tends to flow and to conform to the outline of its container: a liquid or a gas

examples: a fluid situation fraught with uncertainty
everything was unstable following the coup

definitions.text: characteristic of a fluid; capable of flowing and easily changing shape

examples: the fluid motion of a cat
the liquid grace of a ballerina

definitions.text: in cash or easily convertible to cash

examples: Britain is not a truly fluid society
